author: xtqqczze
body:
* Enable [EnforceCodeStyleInBuild](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/project-sdk/msbuild-props#enforcecodestyleinbuild)
* Disable IDE0048 due to rule violations (see also: #13936)
* Disable IDE0073 due to rule violations (see also: #13935)
* Disable IDE0036: due to rule violations (see also: #13958)
